message: Let's get started! I'll give you 300k, a fair share.
Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair, right?
You wanted to split it evenly, but I'll give you a slight discount. You can do better than that, right?
I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time, but we need to make a deal soon before inflation eats away at our gains!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving up on getting a better deal. You can do better than that, Bob!
